text: Penn's Landing is an area of Center City Philadelphia. It is right along the Delaware River. The Penn's Landing contains parks such as Spruce Street Harbor Park and Blue Cross RiverRink Winterfest and Summerfest. There are several summer events at The Great Plaza. There are museums connected to the historic ships. The submarine USS Becuna and the Spanishâ€“American War-era cruiser USS Olympia (C-6) are part of the Independence Seaport Museum. There is a Vietnam Veterans Memorial and Korean War Memorial at Penn's Landing. Category:Philadelphia
title: Penn's Landing
